title: The Enduring wilderness
creator_credit: Ernest Reid and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A scenic tour of Canada’s national parks, from the mountains of British Columbia to the seaswept shores of Newfoundland. Besides the beauty of the unspoiled wilderness (and there is much of that), you see also the farsightedness of those who in the past century, set aside these territories for the enjoyment of future generations.
